description:
As if hanging ten weren't difficult enough, try hanging 66.在冲浪板上站10个人已经非常难， 那66个人呢？

On Saturday, 66 surfers piled onto a 42-foot-long surfboard off the shores of Huntington Beach, California, affectionately nicknamed Surf City, to break the Guinness World Record for "Most People Riding a Surfboard at Once." Because the previous record, 47 people, just wasn't enough.本周六，“冲浪之城”加州的亨廷顿海滩，66位冲浪者在一块42英寸的冲浪板上挨在一起，准备打破“在一块冲浪板上同时站立人数最多”的吉尼斯世界纪录。因为，他们还不满足于此前的记录，47人。

The group had to successfully stay on the board for at least ten seconds in order to break the record.冲浪板上的人必须成功在板上至少停留10秒，方能打破记录。

The event was organized as part of a Surf City USA event for International Surfing Day.该活动的举办是作为国际冲浪日在美国冲浪城活动的一部分。

Perhaps next year those 66 surfers will blow everyone's minds by actually riding a wave!也许在明年，这66个冲浪者让人们再次惊讶是因为在冲上了真正的波浪！

title: 66人站一块冲浪板是怎样一种体验？
